messages.message: Method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ParameterTypeHint\BadExample::test() does not have parameter type hint nor @param annotation for its parameter $name.
Method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ParameterTypeHint\BadExample::test() does not have parameter type hint nor @param annotation for its parameter $age.
@param annotation of method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ParameterTypeHint\BadExample::another() does not specify type hint for items of its traversable parameter $items.

Method \Tests\Sniffs\SlevomatCodingStandard\TypeHints\ParameterTypeHint\BadExample::another() does not have native type hint for its parameter $items but it should be possible to add it based on @param annotation "array".
